title: Sri Lanka crisis Live Updates: Rajapaksas’ ancestral home set ablaze by anti-govt protesters; ruling party MP among 3 killed in clash - The Indian Express
content:
1. Sri Lanka crisis Live Updates: Rajapaksas’ ancestral home set ablaze by anti-govt protesters; ruling party MP among 3 killed in clash  The Indian Express
  2. Sri Lankan PM Resigns, Ruling Party MP Dies In Clashes  NDTV
  3. Sri Lanka economic crisis Mahinda Rajapaksa resigns news live updates: Ancestral home Rajapaksas, houses of several MPs set on fire  Times of India
  4. Mahinda Rajapaksa's Resignation: Is Martial Law Now Imminent in Sri Lanka?  India.com
  5. Lanka PM Quits, Rajapaksa Family Home Set On Fire Amid Clashes: 10 Facts  NDTV

description: Sri Lanka Crisis Live Updates: Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa stepped down from his post on Monday — a step that would enable his younger brother, President Gotabaya Rajapaksa, to go for a government of national unity as the country continues to face the worst economic crisis in its history.
